transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good afternoon sir. Sir Poonam baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se aap. Actually sir wo kuch issue aa raha hai aapko to aapne video making ke liye bola tha. Main link share kar du sir?
Customer: Ah, kya karna hai usme link pe jaake?
Executive: Sir dekhiye main link aapko whatsapp pe share karungi. Aap usko join kijiyega and screen share kijiyega. Aap bol rahe the na aapka login nahi ho raha hai. Login karne mein kuch interface aa raha hai na sir? Wo main fir aapko guide karungi kaise karna hai.
Customer: Ha batao.
Executive: Theek hai, main link share kar rahi hu. Isi number pe karu sir whatsapp pe?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Theek hai, ek second sir wait. Phone pe, phone mein kar rahe hai sir right?
Customer: Kya kar rahe ho?
Executive: Sir phone mein hi kar rahe hai na aap? Phone se kar rahe hai?
Customer: Ha, phone se connect kar raha hu.
Executive: Ha. Theek hai ek second. Sir whatsapp number bataiye sir. Hamare paas show nahi karta aapka pura number.
Customer: 887500
Executive: 887500
Customer: 533
Executive: 533
Customer: 533
Executive: 533, okay.

Executive: Sir dekhiye message aaya mera?
Customer: Ek minute, I think off hai sir.

Executive: Aaya sir?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ha, abhi aap ispe mujhe hello kijiye. Hello kijiye pehle hello kijiye sir. Mujhe hello ka message bhejiye. Fir aap join kar payenge.
Executive: Ha, abhi aap link pe click karke join kijiye.

: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.

: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Executive: Okay ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issue with login.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a link on WhatsApp.

- Asked customer to click on the link.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- login, video making, whatsapp
